com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics

Class ShaderLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics.ShaderLoader

  • public class ShaderLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the loading of shaders from disk. It will load and compile shaders and store them in memory for retreival.

      • getShaderProgram

        public com.jogamp.opengl.util.glsl.ShaderProgram getShaderProgram(java.lang.String vertex,
                                                         java.lang.String fragment)
        Get loaded shader program. Specify the vertex and frag shader filenames of a loaded shader program to get access to a compiled ShaderProgram
        Parameters:
        vertex - name of the vertex shader
        fragment - name of the fragment shader
        Returns:
        built ShaderProgram

        Loads compiles and links given shader program
        Parameters:
        vertexURI - vertex shader to load
        fragmentURI - fragment shader to load
